text: All good. Very nice beer and tasty food

(Translated by Google) Sufficient ice cream

(Original)
Gelato sufficiente
Fantastic venue
Very lovely place. Amazing selection of Dutch drinks. But a bit crowded and no table service. You have to go to the bar every time you want to order. And I wish they had a smoking area.
Nice bar for.somemnice beers

This pub has been there for years! Always good selection of beer and lager and good-humoured bar staff. No pressure on us either to buy more or to leave. Nice chips, fiercely expensive (though maybe not for the area).
Best Hieneken outside of Holland
Nice sushi
Great bar great choice if beers. Great for watching sports.
Loads of European beers
Unusual choice of Dutch beers, was able to find a seat upstairs!

They were objectively racist. I have never written a review, but at a belgian pub, i was refused drinks (as is their right) without any clear reason (if you are passed out or throwing up you should be refused), but lucid it is shocking
Unfortunately they didn't know what a 'bittergarnituur' was. Maybe as Dutchies we expected too much of the Dutch experience. Drinks were good though!
Decent pub, often quite busy. Wouldn't suggest it for a 'Dutch' experience. Is more like a regular pub with some Dutch beers on offer.  Because of being so crowed, we left pretty early on.
Nice enough pub, good selection of beer. Quite expensive but expected for a central London pub
Love this place, my mum met my dad here over 20 years ago and no I go here with them age 20!! Crazy

(Translated by Google) Nice bar with lots of Flemish beers

(Original)
Leuke bar met heel veel Vlaamse bieren

(Translated by Google) Nice place, discovered by accident after a day of wandering around London, a very pleasant place with delicious beers

(Original)
Leuke plaats, per toeval ontdekt na een dagje rond dwalen in Londen een zeer aangename plek met heerlijke bieren

I think my granddad has been here during the 2e world war. He was sailing between england and holland as a captain for the dutch "Koopvaardij". He never told us were he realy stayed but i like to thinks that he drunk his beer in this pub.
Now my son lives in London and this is his favoriet Pub. It gives me a good feeling!
Tasty Dutch beer
Fantastic bar with lots of Dutch and Belgian beer choices, I'll definitely be back again üçª
My favourite bar serving a wide choice of draft and bottle Belgium beers in a pleasant continental style bar. Also serving excellent continental food.
Cosy pub. Usually quite quiet so you can always get a seat
Amazing selection of beers and great screens for the football. Loads of space and seats upstairs if it looks busy downstairs.

Belgian beer on tap in London! This makes me happy.
Love the beer and the pub too

Having worked here over 10 years ago I have a soft spot for De Hems. It's less "dutch" themed than I remember but they still have a great selection of beers and some great Dutch snacks (I'd recommend the kaassouffle - breaded deep fried ‚Ä¶
Very typical, nice atmosphere, many kind of beers

My company booked an area upstairs for our Christmas Party 11/1/2020. The process of booking and the communication back and forth was very easy. We ordered off the buffet menu and the food was great. Catered for the vegans and vegetarians ‚Ä¶
Awsome, so many beers
Always fun to be in London and visit a dutch pub. Nice athmosphere.
Some good beers, but there were some notable missing beers from the bottle menu.
A great bar with a wide selection of beer and good food, but can get v busy.
Quirky, noisy but still a good place to kick off an evening
nice bar very busy best early
Good atmosphere and a good choice of beers
A really nice Dutch bar in a very central location. Very nice ambience and atmosphere. It was especially good to get a pint of Lindeboom, not a beer I have seen for a while.
Interesting place. Amazing range of beers
Packed as usual but great beers. Fruli on tap.
